title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature                   Geology and Hydrology               Animals               Plants               Ecosystems         Â      A researcher explores a wetland at Great Sand Dunes as part of an amphibian survey of the park. NPS/Ola Bovin  Great Sand Dunes National Park and Preserve encourages scientific research by academic, agency, and independent research scientists. A Research Permit is required to conduct scientific research or surveys in the park and preserve.
